articles.author: Isabella Volmert
articles.title: Indiana lawmakers in state House to convene session with redistricting top of mind - AP News
articles.description: Indiana lawmakers in the state House of Representatives are gathering Monday with the possibility of advancing redistricting legislation, increasing pressure on their Senate colleagues to get on board with redrawing the state's congressional map. After pressu…
articles.content: Indiana House members are expected to press forward Monday with redrawing the states congressional districts in Republicans favor, increasing pressure on their defiant counterparts in the GOP-led Sen… [+3324 chars]
